en.question: Part 1. When you decide whether something is right or wrong, to what extent are the following considerations relevant to your thinking? Whether or not someone suffered emotionally . Please rate each statement using this scale:
answers: 0: not at all relevant (This consideration has nothing to do with my judgments of right and wrong)

en.question: Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: Compassion for those who are suffering is the most crucial virtue.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: When the government makes laws, the number one principle should be ensuring that everyone is treated fairly.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: I am proud of my country’s history.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: Respect for authority is something all children need to learn.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: People should not do things that are disgusting, even if no one is harmed.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: One of the worst things a person could do is hurt a defenseless animal.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: Justice is the most important requirement for a society.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: People should be loyal to their family members, even when they have done something wrong.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: Men and women each have different roles to play in society.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: I would call some acts wrong on the grounds that they are unnatural.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: It can never be right to kill a human being.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: I think it’s morally wrong that rich children inherit a lot of money while poor children inherit nothing.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: It is more important to be a team player than to express oneself.

Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: If I were a soldier and disagreed with my commanding officer’s orders, I would obey anyway because that is my duty.
Part 2. Please read the following sentences and indicate your agreement or disagreement: Chastity is an important and valuable virtue.
